fields.name: factory 2
fields.description: A factory that stores and packages products

fields.name: factory 1
fields.description: A factory that manufactures, stores and packages products

fields.name: currentdate
fields.description: Current date of the plan, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

fields.name: loading_time_units
fields.description: Time units to be used for the resource report: hours, days, weeks

fields.name: plan.administrativeLeadtime
fields.description: Specifies the number of days (value can be decimal) sales orders should be planned ahead of their due date to take into account for an administrative lead time. Default: 0

fields.name: plan.minimumdelay
fields.description: Specifies a minimum delivery date increment (in seconds) used by the planning algorithm in its search. Default: 0

fields.name: plan.loglevel
fields.description: Controls the verbosity of the planning log file. Accepted values are 0 (silent - default), 1 and 2 (verbose)

fields.name: plan.rotateResources
fields.description: When set to true, the algorithm will better distribute the demand across alternate suboperations instead of using the preferred operation

fields.name: plan.autoFenceOperations
fields.description: The number of days the solver should wait for a confirmed replenishment before generating a proposed order. Default:999 (wait indefinitely)

fields.name: plan.deliveryDuration
fields.description: The duration (in working hours) for the final shipment of a sales order to the customer. Default: 0

fields.name: plan.individualPoolResources
fields.description: When set to true, an operation-resource record with quantity N is interpreted as 'find N member resources of size 1' instead of 'find a member resource with size N'

fields.name: currency
fields.description: Set the currency symbol, defaults to suffix, add a comma after the symbol to make it a prefix

fields.name: plan.fixBrokenSupplyPath
fields.description: Creates item supplier records with Unknown supplier to fix broken supply path. Default is true.
Controls rescheduling approved orders early. Values: 0 (inactive, default), 1 (active preserving existing resource assignments, 2 (active replanning resource assignments)

fields.name: WIP.consume_material
fields.description: Determines whether confirmed manufacturing orders consume material or not. Default is true.

fields.name: WIP.consume_capacity
fields.description: Determines whether confirmed manufacturing orders, purchase orders and distribution orders consume capacity or not. Default is true.

fields.name: display_time
fields.description: This parameter applies to ALL scenarios and controls if date time fields should display the time. Accepted values: true or false.

fields.name: date_format
fields.description: This parameter applies to ALL scenarios. Accepted values: month-day-year, day-month-year, year-month-day.

fields.name: Purchase box @ factory 1 from Cardboard manfacturer
Purchase box @ factory 2 from Cardboard manfacturer
Purchase ink @ factory 1 from Raw material supplier
Purchase thread @ factory 1 from Raw material supplier
